name: Stan's Parking Jam
description: A fun, enjoyable, puzzle game which you have to help Stand move the cars horizontally or vertically in a fashion which will help Stan get the blue sports car out before the time runs out. Each Level will reward the player 200 point as well the player can earn bonus points by completing the level in as little moves as possible as well as in the shortest time. Compare you score with your friends and family to see who can save Stan’s job the fastest and with the best score!
